title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7420.5 - Grievance program forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7420.5 - Grievance program forms

State Regulations

Each secure facility shall utilize a grievance form that
contains all of the required elements of this Part, including, but not limited
to, an indication as to whether or not a resident has attempted to informally
resolve their complaint, and if so, a description of the
attempt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7420.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
